item.title: Version 1.3.2
item.description:
SuperAgents v1.3.2

  • Flash Agent: System-wide AI text auto-completion with ghost text overlay
  • Improved TTS video animation performance
  • Auto-hide green completion indicator after 10 seconds
  • Fix Escape key being blocked when SuperAgents has nothing to cancel
  • Resolve Apple notarization hangs by fixing network and sandbox configuration

item.title: Version 1.0.1
item.description:
SuperAgents v1.0.1

  • Rebranded from Commander to SuperAgents
  • New app icon with metallic frame design
  • Voice-controlled AI assistant
  • Dynamic Island-style notch UI
  • Multiple AI providers (Claude, GPT, Gemini)
  • Screen interaction capabilities
  • Memory system for personalization
